text: Wi Ha-joon (born August 5, 1991) is a South Korean actor and model. He came to prominence with his roles in the horror film Gonjiam: Haunted Asylum and romance series Something in the Rain. ==Filmography== ===Film=== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Year !
